channel.title: Running my server ,.... how?
channel.description:
i have everything i need for my server, i looked through all the TUT's i have coded the source etc, i have a no-ip ive dont my port forwarding all of that is done, but the problem is how do i open moparscape using my server, do i click run server in my source? then open moparscape with everyhting?
plz post

item.title: Running my server ,.... how?
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

i run my server by clicking runserver.batch, it says
server loading…
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Dearthscape enabled on 0.0.0.0:43594
then i go on moparscape client 3.2, i go on 127.0.0.1, wallah i’m on my server and i can see people going on and off my server and doing commands, using magic on npcs just by watching my runserver.batch

Read full topic

item.title: Running my server ,.... how?
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

Some times if you lagg quite a bit you may want to do this, Go to the desktop
rightclick–>properties–>settings–>advanced–>trouble shoot, then you should see a “hardware acceleration” change it to none. That should help stop you lagg a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Running my server ,.... how?
item.dc:creator: @HelpmePl0x HelpmePl0x
item.description:
@HelpmePl0x wrote:

Simply change:

@echo off title Ambusher "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server pause

To your update - probably the latest if you have followed a TuT so…

@echo off title Ambusher "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

Copy and paste. Fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Running my server ,.... how?
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

edit your compiler and put this in
@echo off
title Ambusher
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe” server
pause

then leave it on while accessing your server
put in your server ip in the space below password and logg in, making sure that your compiler is still on
you should be able to go on
and your compiler should say

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

or something like that

Read full topic
